DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate effect safety auricular acupressure adolescent young woman PCOS . Subjects randomly assign two arm : Auricular acupressure arm placebo auricular acupressure , arm treat three month . Body mass index , oral glucose tolerance test , hormonal profile metabolic profile determine .
DOC.brief_title: Auricular Acupressure ( AA ) For Overweight/Obese Adolescent Young Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.criteria: Women age 12 25 year . Diagnosis PCOS accord modify Rotterdam criterion . 2 year menarche . Body mass index ( BMI ) equal great 23 kg/m*m. Administration medication know affect reproductive function metabolism within past three month , include oral contraceptive , Gonadotropinreleasing hormone ( GnRH ) agonists antagonist , anti androgen , gonadotropin , antiobesity drug , Chinese herbal medicine , anti diabetic drug metformin thiazolidinediones , somatostatin , diazoxide , calcium channel blocker . Patients endocrine disorder include 21hydroxylase deficiency , hyperprolactinemia , uncorrected thyroid disease , suspect Cushing 's syndrome . Patients know severe organ dysfunction mental illness .
